biotools.summary: Practical High-Quality Electrostatic Potential Surfaces for Drug Discovery Using a Graph-Convolutional Deep Neural Network | A Graph-Convolutional Deep Neural Network for predicting electrostatic potential surfaces | For generating ligand PQR files, a graph convolutional deep neural network (DNN) model, trained on ESP surfaces derived using DFT calculations for ~100,000 molecules, is used. For proteins, parametrized charges for amino acids are used, which are fully compatible with the ligand ESP surfaces generated using the DNN model
